main event: Robert G. Waldron, Jr. observed a bright, round, luminous object hovering in the sky near Little Rock, Arkansas on September 6, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed through the window of an automobile while driving,The object was described as round and silvery-grey, larger than an ordinary airplane,It appeared to be stationary and was visible for about 10 minutes,The observer reported the sighting to Air Force Intelligence,No sound was heard from the object and it did not resemble any known aerial vehicle.
witness description: Robert G. Waldron, Jr., observed the object while driving.
